resources.string:
"Hey! Glad you're interested in donating! All donations go towards further development. Send donations to:
1KQwwWfuATJZogLTk9nmPNyY4egS1PUvqY

"Wait wait wait! Please realize that you may send one push to a million devices - or a million pushes to one device - per month. Don't abuse the push notifications! If you do, you will be removed from the application."
"An update is available. In order to continue, you must update this application. Please select OK or quit."
